sentences.sContent: He spent the rest of the game trying to redeem himself after a first-minute mistake.
sentences.sCn: 比赛余下的时间里，他都在尽力弥补开局时的失误。

synos.tran: 赎回；挽回；兑换；履行；补偿；恢复

words.tran: 可赎回的；可偿还的；可挽救的；可换成现款的
救世主；赎身者；偿还者；买回者
履行；挽回；补救（redeem的现在分词形式）

trans.tranOther: to do something that will improve what other people think of you, after you have behaved badly or failed
